fields_draw.fields_draw_help_text: You can use a placeholder with {} but every placeholder must be in preview fields.

raw_data_install.quick_search_entities_append_join: LEFT JOIN customers_type ON customers_type = customers_type_id

LEFT JOIN projects ON projects_id = tasks_project_id
LEFT JOIN tasks_status ON tasks_status = tasks_status_id

LEFT JOIN projects ON projects_id = tickets_project_id
LEFT JOIN tickets_status ON tickets_status = tickets_status_id
LEFT JOIN customers ON customers_contacts_customer_id = customers_id

layouts_boxes.layouts_boxes_content:
db->order_by('entity_name')->where('entity_type',1)->get('entity')->result_array(); $saved_data = $this->db->query("SELECT * FROM quick_search_entities")->result_array(); $saved_entities = array(); foreach ($saved_data as $entity) { $saved_entities[] = $entity['quick_search_entities_entity_name']; } $x=0; ?>

Select the entities you want to have highlighted to quickly search records. Use the checkbox only to add/remove entities. Default searchable fields are preview fields.
If you want customize, Fields preview / Fields searchable, for each entity, check the table in bottom side.
